activities: It is possible that the customers of our SaaS application(s) will use our toolset to capture, store, and analyze personal information from any country, including all the EU members and/or Switzerland.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Any type of personal data could be processed by our organization, all of which would be covered by the Safe Harbor Framework.  Any of those data could be manually processed.
